name: Trini Kwan - Yellow Tiger Quiz / Test | TV for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: When not fighting as a Power Ranger, what did Trini do for fun?
options: Baked cookies and cakes for the homeless.
questions.explanation:
She collected dolls.

	Trini had a lot of extracurricular activities she was involved in. On top of collecting dolls, one of which was turned into a monster in season 1, she cared about the environment, mentored younger students and played sports.

questions.text: Which Zord did Trini pilot in the first season of "Mighty Morphin Power Rangers"?
questions.explanation:
Saber-Toothed Tiger Dinozord.

	Trini harnessed the power of the Saber-Toothed Tiger Dinozord, which was yellow and included the fangs of a tiger. When combined with the others to form the Megazord, hers was one of the legs of the giant robot.

questions.text: Why did Trini give up her powers and leave the team?
questions.correct: She chose to go to a peace conference in Switzerland.
options: She graduated from high school and moved away.
She lost her power coin and the ability to morph in a fight with a monster.
questions.explanation:
She chose to go to a peace conference in Switzerland.

	Trini, along with Jason and Zack, decided to attend the World Peace Conference in Switzerland, forcing them to leave the team. After she left, the character was never shown again in an unmorphed state.

questions.text: Trini was the first Ranger to defeat a monster alone, without the help of a Zord.
questions.explanation:
True.

	She bested Bones in the season 1 episode "High Five". Bones was a giant skeleton with a large hat and scepter. Bones was one of the few monsters to never be enlarged. Trini fought him after the other Rangers had been transported to other dimensions.

questions.text: Trini and Billy dated throughout the first season of "Mighty Morphin Power Rangers".
questions.explanation:
False.

	Trini never dated any of the other Rangers. She did however appear to have feelings for Richie, a martial arts loving employee at the Angel Grove Youth Center. Richie appeared in a dozen season 2 episodes.

questions.text: Which of the following "Power Rangers" villains did Trini never battle against, as a Ranger?
questions.explanation:
Divatox.

	Divatox was from "Power Rangers Turbo". Rita, Goldar and the Putty Patrollers were all around for the first three seasons of "Mighty Morphin Power Rangers". Trini left the show during season two.

questions.text: What weapon did Trini use during season 1 of "Mighty Morphin Power Rangers"?
questions.explanation:
Power Daggers.

	The Rangers weapons were: Power Sword (red) Power Daggers (yellow) Power Bow (pink), Power Axe (black) and Power Lance (blue). Each Ranger also had a blaster.

Griffin.

	The Griffin Thunderzord was made by "upgrading" the Saber-Toothed Tiger Dinozord. It wasn't explained if the Thunderzords were simply remodeled versions of the old zords, or complete rebuilds using some of the parts.

questions.text: Which character replaced Trini as the yellow Ranger?
questions.explanation:
Aisha Campbell.

	Aisha was the second yellow Ranger, and Tanya was Aisha's replacement when the series became the "Power Rangers Zeo". Kim and Cat were both pink Rangers.

questions.text: Which fellow Ranger was also Trini's best friend?
questions.explanation:
Kimberly.

	Trini and Kim both loved to shop. Trini shopped for new dolls and teddy bears, while Kim was more of a clothes shopper. Both characters referred to the other as their best friend numerous times.
